corail_pillar.item.pillar_tweaker.desc: Allows you to cycle through the pillar variants
corail_pillar.item.pillar_tweaker.use1: Left click on a pillar to modify its variant
corail_pillar.item.pillar_tweaker.use2: Right click on a pillar to modify its size
corail_pillar.tooltip.more_info: 按住 shift 鍵以取得更多資訊
